Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.common

Interface Server

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerImpl, ServerStub
public interface Server extends Remote

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    accessExistingGame(Client client, int gameID)
    Method called from the client when he wants to join an existing game that hasn't started yet.
    void
    accessNewGame(Client client, int numOfPlayers)
    Method called by a client when he wants to create a new game
    void
    chooseNickname(Client client, String nickname)
    Called by a client to set his nickname, it checks that the name is unique.
    GameController
    getGameController(Client client)
    Method called by an RMI client to get his game controller, it makes sure to export the stub only once.
    void
    imAlive(Client client)
    Part of the resilience, method called every 5 seconds from the client.
    void
    leaveGame(Client client)
    Method called by a client when he wants to leave a game, he won't be able to rejoin.
    void
    register(Client client)
    First method called by a client connected to the server, it adds the client to the loggedOutClients list

  • Method Details

    • register

      void register(Client client) throws RemoteException
      First method called by a client connected to the server, it adds the client to the loggedOutClients list
      Parameters:
      client - client that has connected
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • chooseNickname

      void chooseNickname(Client client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Called by a client to set his nickname, it checks that the name is unique. It also checks if there is a disconnected player with that nickname associated to a game, in this case, it reconnects the client to the game.
      Parameters:
      client - client caller
      nickname - nickname chosen
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • accessExistingGame

      void accessExistingGame(Client client, int gameID) throws RemoteException
      Method called from the client when he wants to join an existing game that hasn't started yet.
      Parameters:
      client - caller
      gameID - game id of the game to join
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • accessNewGame

      void accessNewGame(Client client, int numOfPlayers) throws RemoteException
      Method called by a client when he wants to create a new game
      Parameters:
      client - client caller
      numOfPlayers - number of players to set for the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getGameController

      GameController getGameController(Client client) throws RemoteException
      Method called by an RMI client to get his game controller, it makes sure to export the stub only once.
      Parameters:
      client - client caller
      Returns:
      the game controller stub
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame(Client client) throws RemoteException
      Method called by a client when he wants to leave a game, he won't be able to rejoin.
      Parameters:
      client - client caller
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • imAlive

      void imAlive(Client client) throws RemoteException
      Part of the resilience, method called every 5 seconds from the client. In every call, it sets a new timeout of 10 seconds on that client.
      Parameters:
      client - client caller
      Throws:
      RemoteException
